setting.time: 22nd century, twilight with dual star system creating ethereal lighting
setting.location: Surface installation beside living ocean of planet Solaris
setting.weather: Artificial atmospheric bubble protecting from toxic alien environment

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair touched by alien light, face showing profound peace mixed with melancholic acceptance
characters.clothing: Environmental suit with helmet removed, protected by atmospheric field
characters.position: Kneeling at edge of alien ocean, one hand extended toward living plasma surface
characters.action: Reaching out to touch alien intelligence directly, movement showing both reverence and acceptance of final mystery

scene.mainElements: Living ocean surface responding to human presence, plasma formations reaching toward extended hand, atmospheric protection field shimmering around contact point
scene.details: Ocean surface creating perfect negative impression of human hand, plasma flowing in impossible patterns around contact point, dual star light reflecting off living surface, atmospheric field distorting view slightly, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Vast alien ocean extending to horizon, dual star system casting red and blue light across plasma surface, distant orbital station visible as small point in sky, cosmic environment emphasizing infinite scale
scene.atmosphere: Profound mystical contact between human consciousness and incomprehensible alien intelligence, melancholic beauty of brief understanding across impossible gulf, acceptance of mystery that cannot be solved but can be touched

composition.cameraAngle: Close-up shot focusing on moment of contact
composition.focus: Human hand meeting alien intelligence at surface interface
composition.depth: Contact point in sharp foreground, kneeling figure in middle ground, infinite alien ocean extending into cosmic background
